# Bolas, Windrunner
## Overview
**Bolas, Windrunner:** These weighted loops of rope can do 1d4 lethal or non-lethal damage and can be used to make a ranged trip attack. If the attack succeeds, the victim is considered [[Pinned|pinned]], per the PF [[Grapple|grapple]] rules.


| **Exotic Weapons** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range** | **Weight** | **Type** |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Bolas, Windrunner | 50 gp | 1d4 | 1d4 | Ã—2 | 30 ft. | 4 lbs. | B |

**Source:** Midgard Campaign Setting (Open Design), pg. 94
